title: Sask. health minister asks regulatory bodies to investigate controversial facility after CBC report
description: Saskatchewan’s Health Minister says his government has asked the organization that regulates doctors and the treasury crown tasked with protecting consumers to investigate concerns raised in a recent CBC investigation of a controversial health centre in Moose…
